query:
SELECT 
                    u.id as "id!",
                    u.name as "name!",
                    u.username as "username!",
                    u.email as "email!",
                    r.created_at as "joined_at!"
                FROM referrals r
                JOIN users u ON r.referee_id = u.id
                WHERE r.referrer_id = $1
                ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
